snippet: Two soldiers were also killed in a bomb blast as the army waged a new offensive against Islamist militants in the south.
abstract: Gunmen kill army colonel in Aden,Yemen, and two soldiers are also wounded in car bomb blast as army wages new offensive against Islamist militants in the south.
lead_paragraph: Two soldiers were also killed in a bomb blast as the army waged a new offensive against Islamist militants in the south.

headline.main: Yemeni Army Officer Is Killed as Clashes With Militants Grow
